name: W_hale.gif
description:
Set to original music, W_hale.gif is a simple third person flight sim through some dream and some regular landscapes. There are no goals or points. Just fly around and enjoy the environments.

Controls:

Arrow keys for directions

Mouse for camera

Mouse click and hold for boost

Space bar  for jump or lift

Esc to return to main menu

New levels will be uploaded for free later, all suggestions for improvements welcome :)
